name: scrum-project
description: This assignment is a big, beefy one. We will be working in group to create an e-Bay-like website for a client. This is a project where the deadline is in 2 weeks. As of now, this is the biggest assignment that BeCode has given us yet.

scripts.start: cd server && npm install && node server.js
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd app && npm install && npm run build
